subtests.name: e.style['border-width'] = "5px" should not set unrelated longhands
e.style['border-width'] = "thick thin" should not set unrelated longhands
e.style['border-width'] = "thin medium thick" should set border-bottom-width
e.style['border-width'] = "thin medium thick" should set border-left-width
e.style['border-width'] = "thin medium thick" should set border-right-width
e.style['border-width'] = "thin medium thick" should set border-top-width
e.style['border-width'] = "thin medium thick" should not set unrelated longhands
e.style['border-width'] = "1px 2px 3px 4px" should not set unrelated longhands
